channel.title: Please Fast Answer! Question!
channel.description:
How can i do that when u press on an NPC, it asks: "Do you want to buy beer?" And that when u press "no", conversation gets closed, but that when u press "Yes", 2 coins go away of ur inventory and u get a beer. And when u don't got enough, the NPC says: "You don't have enough gold" en then when u press next, conversation gets closed.
And, please give me the right code. Before this one, someone else gaved me a wrong code, and me server got f*cked up. Couldn't compile. But luckily, i could delete the codes, and me server got fine.
And if u need this: Im using 317 HomieScape!!

item.title: Please Fast Answer! Question!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

How can i do that when u press on an NPC, it asks: “Do you want to buy beer?” And that when u press “no”, conversation gets closed, but that when u press “Yes”, 2 coins go away of ur inventory and u get a beer.
